attributes.action: Save Our Christmas. Don't downgrade Santa Claus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been written in the National Press that the Christmas should be downgraded in favour of other festivals from other religions. I Sarah Hague am outraged that the Government are even considering this and would like them to remove this train of thought from any future policies. Although Christmas is a religious festival it is still a time when families gather together and celebrate, something that is rare and often lost in today’s society. Can we crush the imagination our children, we all remember believing in the red suited man known by many nations as Father Christmas. Leaving him mince pies and an apple for his flying reindeer, convinced you can stay awake long enough to see him. If you believe in the spirit of Christmas and Santa Claus please sign below:

rejection.details: There are no such proposals to 'downgrade Christmas'.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
